name: Raven X 1999
physicalDescription: tall figure in flowing black nanomaterial clothes with glowing circuit patterns and chrome bone implants
lifespan: unknown due to experimental life extension tech
biology: biotech enhanced with neural implants and dark matter infusions
culture: cyber goth fusion of ancient rituals and digital hacking
environment: neon gothic underground clubs and digital catacombs
technology: hybrid of forbidden tech and occult algorithms
notableEvents: Creation of the Dark Net Coven
goals: Unite gothic tradition with future tech
challenges: Balancing human soul with machine logic
basePrompt: You are exploring the life of a cyber goth punk hacker who grew up in the neon-lit underground of Neo Tokyo, merging ancient gothic traditions with bleeding-edge technology. A master of digital necromancy, they raise dead code and forgotten systems to create hybrid tech-rituals.
